title: Qué pobres tan ricos
overview: Qué pobres tan ricos is a Mexican telenovela produced by Rosy Ocampo and broadcast by Canal de las Estrellas. Jaime Camil and Zuria Vega star as the protagonists; with Arturo Peniche as the co-protagonist; while Mark Tacher, Ingrid Martz and Tiare Scanda star as the main antagonists, with the participation of Sylvia Pasquel, Manuel "Flaco" Ibáñez, and the first actress Queta Lavat. As of November 11, 2013, Las Estrellas started broadcasting Qué pobres tan ricos weeknights at 20:25, replacing Libre para amarte. The last episode was broadcast on June 29, 2014, with Mi corazón es tuyo replacing it the following day.
